name: Droplet Journey
description:
Once some droplets of water, round and content with life were in love but suddenly they fell apart. Around them as far as they could see, there were solid walls and obstacles. A strange world surrounded them and all they wanted to get back together. They quivered in fear..how to get home?

Droplet needs your help to meet his Samantha. There are puzzles in circles, squares and triangular form and you need to avoid collision with obstacles. You need to pick up the energy drops to give the droplet the ability to open the gate to each world level. There are 150 puzzles in total 3 worlds and you need to solve them all to get it back home.
